typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Roles.Role storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)

devdoc.details: Allowlisted accounts have been forbidden by a AllowlistAdmin to perform certain actions (e.g. participate in a crowdsale). This role is special in that the only accounts that can add it are AllowlistAdmins (who can also remove it), and not Allowlisteds themselves.
devdoc.title: AllowlistedRole
